item.description:
From the Manchester Meetup:

We had a great time canvassing with the NY crew last weekend, and more efficient methods have arised. In addition IDing the voters versus immediate Ron Paul advocation gets us into a conversation more easily, making better for those less comfortable with canvassing

Unless something big comes up ill be canvassing twice a day on Sat and Sunday come join the fun. Any Ron Paul activity is a blast!


We have plenty of canvassing packets left, so we will meet at Murphy's Taproom, split into pairs or teams of three to head out for an hour or two.

Please RSVP so we can make appropriate plans.

Thanks, and I hope to see you all there!
item.name: Manchester Canvassing
